MAN.TITLE: aviopen

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: A string, the video filename to be read.
A number, the opened video file index.

DESCRIPTION.P: aviopen open a video file, but it does not read frames from the file. Please use im=avireadframe(n) to get a frame from the n'th opened video file. Remember to close the opened file using aviclose(n) or avicloseall().
Video support for SIVP is only available when SIVP is compiled with OpenCV which support video I/O.
